ai-patthana18.28:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.28:0.3_0: Transmigrating for the sake of adornments and so on,
ai-patthana18.28:1.1_0: Gained by the refuge, depends on the teaching, and doesn’t give rise to the cause.
ai-patthana18.28:1.1_1: Consciousness that has a reasoned state, does not give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana18.28:1.1_2: This is the section in brief.
